name: tentree Highline Cotton Acre Sweater - Women's
description:
With its timeless silhouette and asymmetric cross-body cut, the Highline Acre brings a little fun to the classic sweater.Organic cotton knit wears well and has a familiar comfort.tentree’s goal is to construct quality apparel and ensure that ten trees are planted for every article of clothing sold.Regular fit feels just right.
